title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: From maker ColdKey comes 2x of their Genesis Edition cards:LOT 1: 2019 ColdKey Genesis Edition #85LOT 2: 2019 ColdKey Genesis Edition #86STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: OCTOBER 6st, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: minerjones
